      private static spark.Route getCommentsForPost(com.google.gson.Gson gson, Database db, boolean needsUser, boolean needsPost)
      Creates the route to handle get comments requests
      Parameters:
      gson - Gson object that handles shared serialization
      db - Database object to execute the method of
      needsUser - If a specific userID is needed
      needsPost - If a specific postID is needed
      Returns:
      Returns a spark Route object that handles the json behavior for comments

      Returns:

    • getJSONResponse

      private static Object getJSONResponse(com.google.gson.Gson gson, String errorMsg, boolean errResult, String message, Object data, spark.Response response)
      Returns JSON response on error or OK
      Parameters:
      gson - GSON to convert to JSON
      errorMsg - Error Message
      errResult - Evaluation of result
      message - mMessage for JSON on OK
      data - mData for JSON on OK
      response - for setting response status
      Returns:
      JSON response

    • getDatabaseConnection

      Gets database connect using enviroment variables
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      connected database

    • getIntFromEnv

      static int getIntFromEnv(String envar, int defaultVal)
      get an integer environment variable if it exists, and otherwise return the default value.
      Parameters:
      envar - The name of the environment variable to get.
      defaultVal - The integer value to use as the default if envar isn't found
      Returns:
      The best answer we could come up with for a value for envar

    • enableCORS

      private static void enableCORS(String origin, String methods, String headers)
      Set up CORS headers for the OPTIONS verb, and for every response that the server sends. This only needs to be called once.
      Parameters:
      origin - The server that is allowed to send requests to this server
      methods - The allowed HTTP verbs from the above origin
      headers - The headers that can be sent with a request from the above origin
